name: InvasiveHaemophilusInfluenzaeDiseaseTestsForHaemophilusInfluenzaeTypeBAntigenInCerebrospinalFluid
title: Invasive Haemophilus influenzae Disease (Tests for Haemophilus influenzae Type B Antigen in Cerebrospinal Fluid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Haemophilus influenzae type B antigen in Cerebrospinal fluid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Haemophilus influenzae B Ag/ Specimen = Cerebral Spinal Fluid;  

LOINC Search: 'Haemophilus influenzae B Ag CSF'),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
